div.p: What is the best book you've ever read and why?
The best book I have already read was a story wrote by Marc Levy.
This writer invente in general a story between two people who fall in love. The story finished always positive.

It's a book that I have read in holiday on the beach. This kind of story is good for student, in general girls love that. Despite, you can't study new knowledge but it's just for plaiser. When I have read this book, I imagnied me in the story.
